title: Does the Samsung Galaxy S22 series have a microSD card slot?
content:
Over the past few years, microSD cards have been slowly but surely disappearing from premium smartphones. As phones get thinner and more compact, there’s no longer space for microSD cards, and you have to rely on internal storage. If you’re wondering whether the Samsung Galaxy S22 series bucks that trend, we have the answer: It

The post Does the Samsung Galaxy S22 series have a microSD card slot? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Want more storage for your phone? The Samsung Galaxy S22 series doesn't support microSD cards, but you can try other solutions.
